sect1.title: Lua-&lua-version;

sect2.title: Installation of Lua
sect2.para: Install Lua by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../lua-&lua-version;-shared_library-1.patch && sed -i '/#define LUA_ROOT/s:/usr/local/:/usr/:' src/luaconf.h && make linux

sect2.para: To test the results, issue: make test.

screen.userinput: make INSTALL_TOP=/usr TO_LIB="liblua.so liblua.so.5.2 liblua.so.&lua-version;" \ INSTALL_DATA="cp -d" INSTALL_MAN=/usr/share/man/man1 install && mkdir -pv /usr/share/doc/lua-&lua-version; && cp -v doc/*.{html,css,gif,png} /usr/share/doc/lua-&lua-version;

sect2.para: Some packages check for the pkg-config file for Lua. As the root user:

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed -i ... src/luaconf.h: This command changes Lua search path to match the install paths.
